description: The path to a target has changed.

event.Summary: Traceroute path to target host $v2 has changed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRoutePathChange DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteCtlTargetAddressType i 0 DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteCtlTargetAddress s EXAMPLE DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteResultsIpTgtAddrType i 0 DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteResultsIpTgtAddr s EXAMPLE

description: Specifies the type of host address to be used on the
traceroute request at the remote host.
variables.name: DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteCtlTargetAddressType

description: Specifies the host address used on the
traceroute request at the remote host. The
host address type can be determined by the
examining the value of the corresponding
traceRouteCtlTargetAddressType index element.
A value for this object MUST be set prior to
transitioning its corresponding traceRouteCtlEntry to
active(1) via traceRouteCtlRowStatus.
variables.name: DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteCtlTargetAddress

description: This objects indicates the type of address stored
in the corresponding traceRouteResultsIpTgtAddr
object.
variables.name: DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteResultsIpTgtAddrType

description: This objects reports the IP address associated
with a traceRouteCtlTargetAddress value when the
destination address is specified as a DNS name.
The value of this object should be a zero length
octet string when a DNS name is not specified or
when a specified DNS name fails to resolve.
variables.name: DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteResultsIpTgtAddr

description: Could not determine the path to a target.

event.Summary: Traceroute could not determine the path to target host $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteTestFailed DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteCtlTargetAddressType i 0 DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteCtlTargetAddress s EXAMPLE DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteResultsIpTgtAddrType i 0 DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteResultsIpTgtAddr s EXAMPLE

description: Specifies the type of host address to be used on the
traceroute request at the remote host.

octet string when a DNS name is not specified or

variables.name: DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteResultsIpTgtAddr

description: The path to a target has just been determined.

event.Summary: Traceroute has determined the path to target host $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteTestCompleted DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteCtlTargetAddressType i 0 DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteCtlTargetAddress s EXAMPLE DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteResultsIpTgtAddrType i 0 DISMAN-TRACEROUTE-MIB::traceRouteResultsIpTgtAddr s EXAMPLE
